**Project Overview**
-------------------

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified Design-Build Teams to submit Proposals for the design and construction of the new Combatant Training and Integration Centre - Atlantic at Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Project Description**
----------------------

This project involves the construction of a new Combatant Training and Integration Centre - Atlantic, located at Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia. The project will require the services of a Design-Build Team to provide design and construction services for the new building.

**Evaluation Criteria**
------------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the RFP documents. The selection of the successful Design-Build Team will be based on a comprehensive evaluation of their qualifications, expertise, and ability to meet the project requirements.

**Security Requirements**
------------------------

The security requirements for this project are outlined in the RFP documents.

**Submissions and Documents**
---------------------------

Bidding and documents are available on [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). A fee may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
